text: Vicenta Arenas Mayor (born January 26, 1975 in Gandia) is a goalball athlete from Spain. She has a disability: she cannot see. She played goalball at the 1996 Summer Paralympics. Her team was third. == References == Category:Spanish goalball players Category:Living people Category:1975 births Category:Paralympic bronze medalists for Spain Category:People from the Valencian Community Category:1996 Summer Paralympics Category:People from Valencia
title: Vicenta Arenas Mayor
